00018 #ifndef TYPEMACROS_H

00020 
00021 #define DEFINE_S(t)   typedef       struct t##S  * t##P,  ** t##PP
00022 #define DEFINE_U(t)   typedef       union  t##U  * t##P,  ** t##PP
00023 #define DEFINE_E(t)   typedef       enum   t##E  * t##P,  ** t##PP
00024 #define DEFINE_CS(t)  typedef const struct t##S  * t##CP, ** t##CPP
00025 #define DEFINE_CU(t)  typedef const union  t##U  * t##CP, ** t##CPP
00026 #define DEFINE_CE(t)  typedef const enum   t##E  * t##CP, ** t##CPP
00027 
00028 #endif /*TYPEMACROS_H*/
